overview:
Jonathan joined notifymd in 2002 and brings 15 years of experience in process design, product development, operations management, and information technology leadership. Jonathan previously worked as a Strategic Planning Manager for Cummins Engine Corporation, the world’s largest manufacturer of diesel engines. Jonathan began his career with the Aspen Skiing company as the Director of Race Operations. Jonathan holds a Master in Business Administration from Vanderbilt University and a Bachelor’s degree from the University of North Carolina.

Jonathan, his wife, and two sons live in Nashville, Tenn. He enjoys skiing, fly fishing, mountain biking, and flying small airplanes. “I enjoy changing the way our business and our customers operate. Technology is changing for the better the way healthcare is delivered, and it is exciting to be at the forefront of that trend.”
